author: NuSan
code:
function update()
 local t=getTime()
 local pcount=500
 for i=0,pcount do
   local f=i/pcount
   local v=f*1000.0+t+0.9
   local d=0.0+pow(f,0.5)*0.8*(1+sin(f*6.25+t*2)*0.2)
   point(cos(v)*d, sin(v)*d, abs(sin(f*500.0))*3)
 end
 for i=0,pcount do
   local f=i/pcount + 0.5
   local v=f*1000.0+t
   local d=0.0+pow(f,0.5)*0.8*(1+sin(f*6.25+t*2)*0.2)
   line(0,0,cos(v)*d, sin(v)*d, abs(sin(f*500.0))*0.2)
 end
end
